All Classes

Class Description
AbstractDAO<T>
The class performs the basic abstract operations for a database like insert, update, delete
App
JavaFX App
Client
This class contains the fields related to the client and getters and setters for them.
ClientBLL
Contains the business logic part of the application that has to do with the client.
ClientController
This class is the Controller for the client view.
ClientDAO
This class extends the AbstractDAO class and sets the parameter T to the object Client
ConnectionFactory  
EmailValidator  
NumberValidator
The class implements the Validator interface with Object Product as the parameter.
OrderBLL
Contains the business logic part of the application that has to do with the orders.
OrderController
This class is the Controller for the order view.
OrderDAO
This class extends the AbstractDAO class and sets the parameter T to the object Order
Orders
This class contains the fields related to the orders and getters and setters for them.
PopUpWindow
This class generates a pop up window which contains an important message for the user and has to be closed in order to continue the flow of the application.
Product
This class contains the fields related to the product and getters and setters for them.
ProductBLL
Contains the business logic part of the application that has to do with the product.
ProductController
This class is the Controller for the product view.
ProductDAO
This class extends the AbstractDAO class and sets the parameter T to the object Product
QuantityValidator
The class implements the Validator interface with Orders Product as the parameter.
TableGenerator<T>
This class is used for generating a table through the reflection technique
Validator<T>  
ViewController
This class is the controller of the main window from which we can enter all the other windows and come back to
